column2: yi: one / 1 / single / a (article) / as soon as / entire / whole / all / throughout / "one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)
yi bian: one side / either side / on the one hand / on the other hand / doing while
tong yi: to unify / to unite / to integrate
yi ding: surely / certainly / necessarily / fixed / a certain (extent etc) / given / particular / must
yi xie: some / a few / a little
yi yang: same / like / equal to / the same as / just like
zhi yi: one of (sth) / one out of a multitude / one (third, quarter, percent etc)
jin yi bu: one step further / to move forward a step / further onwards
